recording.title: Voice Analysis
recording.description: Read the prompts aloud. The analysis takes about 30 seconds.

instructions.title: Instructions:
instructions.item2: Hold your device about 30cm from your mouth
instructions.item3: Read each prompt naturally (no need to act)

step1.script: I parked my car in the garage to drink a bottle of water. I am definitely not a robot.

step2.script: Warning! System failure! Shut it down NOW!

step3.script: Six systems synthesized sixty-six signals simultaneously.

accent.question: To improve accuracy, where did you learn English?

result.footer: Generated by EtchVox / Developed by a husband who was told he sounds like a robot.

share.tagline: Perfect for your Bio, Slack status, or just to warn people.
share.title: SHARE YOUR VOICE ID

errors.microphoneDenied: Microphone access denied. Please allow microphone access and try again.

footer.tagline: Built by a husband who was told he sounds like a robot.

HFEC.name: The Pop Star
HFEC.catchphrase: The center of attention. Your voice brings color to the world.
HFEC.roast: Your voice has the caffeine content of 4 Red Bulls. Great for parties, terrible for hangovers.

HFED.name: The Hype Man
HFED.catchphrase: A machine gun of passion. You turn boring days into dramas.
HFED.roast: You don't talk, you broadcast. Even your whisper sounds like a YouTube intro.

HSEC.name: The Golden Retriever
HSEC.catchphrase: Peak "Energy." You are the human version of a morning sun.
HSEC.roast: Pure vibes, zero thoughts. You sound like you're constantly chasing a tennis ball of happiness.

HSED.name: The Influencer
HSED.catchphrase: Ear-candy energy. You inject dopamine directly into the eardrums.
HSED.roast: I can hear the hashtags in your breath. You sound like you're about to sell me detox tea.

HFCC.name: The Bored Robot
HFCC.catchphrase: Logic on legs. Your voice is as cold as a new MacBook.
HFCC.roast: Error 404: Emotion not found. Your voice is as warm as a server room. Are you my GPS?

HFCD.name: The Tech Lead
HFCD.catchphrase: The cool genius. Your precision is strangely sexy.
HFCD.roast: Your voice sounds like it's about to say 'Actually...' and correct my grammar. It's smartly annoying.

HSCC.name: The ASMR Artist
HSCC.catchphrase: Ultimate purifier. Your voice feels like a forest bath.
HSCC.roast: Too whispery. You sound like you're either trying to soothe a baby or hide a body. Pick a side.

HSCD.name: The Royal
HSCD.catchphrase: Natural-born elegance. Even small talk sounds like a poem.
HSCD.roast: You sound expensive. Like you judge people for buying store-brand pasta. Natural born snob.

LFEC.name: The Commander
LFEC.catchphrase: A soul-shaking bass. You are the leader everyone follows.
LFEC.roast: Are you angry or just breathing? Your 'good morning' sounds like a declaration of war.

LFED.name: The Opera Star
LFED.catchphrase: Pure acoustic power. Your voice is a physical force.
LFED.roast: Main Character Syndrome detected. Please lower your volume, this is a Wendy's.

LSEC.name: The Movie Trailer
LSEC.catchphrase: "In a world..." Your voice is a Hollywood masterpiece.
LSEC.roast: In a world... where you talk normally... wait, you can't. Everything you say sounds like a summer blockbuster.

LSED.name: The Late Night DJ
LSED.catchphrase: Liquid alcohol. A dangerous scent that melts the eardrum.
LSED.roast: Too smooth. Your voice is 90% reverb and 10% pure seduction. Stop trying to flirt with the microphone.

LFCC.name: The News Anchor
LFCC.catchphrase: The embodiment of trust. When you say "it's okay," people believe it.
LFCC.roast: You sound disturbingly trustworthy. You could read a grocery list and make it sound like a national crisis.

LFCD.name: The Sage
LFCD.catchphrase: A philosopher of silence. You don't say much, but you see all.
LFCD.roast: You speak in riddles. I feel like I need to climb a mountain just to ask you where the bathroom is.

LSCC.name: The Loyal Butler
LSCC.catchphrase: Ultimate devotion. A selfless love that embraces any whim.
LSCC.roast: Human Doormat. Your voice has no ego. You sound like you'd apologize to a table if you bumped into it.

LSCD.name: The Deep Whale
LSCD.catchphrase: The 1/f fluctuation. The voice that makes the world stop.
LSCD.roast: Are you speaking or emitting sonar? Frequencies detected are too low for humans. Welcome to the ocean.
